message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business. I know it's worth $1,000,000 to you, and I'm willing to let it go for a price that is fair to both of us. Please consider my offer of $950,000. It's a great deal for you, and it allows me to get a very good price for my product. Let me know your thoughts.
